settings.desc: The true value of adventure. Played by over 20 million Adventurers - Black Desert Online is an open-world, action MMORPG. Experience intense, action-packed combat, battle massive world bosses, fight alongside friends to siege and conquer castles, and train in professions such as fishing, trading, crafting, cooking, and more!

Black Desert’s latest expansion takes you on a perilous journey through the mythical Land of the Morning Light. Explore breath-taking landscapes that are filled to the brim with life, marvel at intricate architecture inspired by the Joseon period characteristic for medieval Korea, and experience thrilling combat with unique boss monsters that resemble villains and characters from traditional Korean folklore and myth.

settings.title: Digital Offer
settings.description_col_1:
In celebration of the launch of Black Desert, Land of the
Morning Light Expansion, we are offering the Black Desert Online Traveller Edition
& Kuku pet for free with select HyperX purchases!*

settings.desc: Giving you unlimited access to the game
A trusted companion that will help you throughout your adventures

settings.heading: Title with Description
settings.title: How to Redeem
settings.description_col_1:
Go to Black Desert Online to create an account: https://pearlabyss.info/hyperx.

Login and redeem your key (under the shop tab).

Download the client from your account and create a character.

From your web account you can now assign your Kuku pet to your server/character.

Enjoy exploring Black Desert and thank you for playing!

settings.heading_text: Evolved with surround sound and adjustable bass
settings.desc: The HyperX Cloud Alpha S is perfect for playing, whether you’re a life skill main, or hardcore grinder. The HyperX Cloud Alpha™ S builds upon the ground breaking Cloud Alpha and features HyperX virtual 7.1 surround sound. The Cloud Alpha S still features the dual-chamber driver system which reduces distortion and provides clearer sound, as well as signature HyperX comfort afforded by the memory foam ear cushions.

settings.heading_text: Compact keyboard featuring custom HyperX mechanical switches
settings.desc: The HyperX Alloy Origins is a compact, sturdy keyboard featuring custom HyperX mechanical switches designed to give gamers the best blend of style, performance, and reliability, meaning it's perfect for completing quests and defeating bosses.

settings.heading_text: Plug N Play audio recording with USB-C connection
settings.desc: For Land of the Morning Light adventurers looking for a USB microphone with great sound quality, the HyperX SoloCast is a must have. It’s Plug N Play with a USB-C connection, making it simple to use, with some of our fan-favourite conveniences like the tap-to-mute sensor and LED mute indicator.

settings.title: Explore Additional Gear Options for Your Adventure
settings.subtitle: Whether you’re adventuring through the scorching heat of a desert metropolis or exploring the breath-taking landscapes in Land of the Morning Light expansion, HyperX Gear can help you enhance your Black Desert Online experience.

settings.description_col_1:
Terms & Conditions of the Promotion*

* Only valid for orders of £50 or more through uk.hyperx.com. You will receive the code(s) on the email address you provided on your order.

The promotion starts on 15/06/2023at 16:00 BST and the promotion ends on 15/07/2023 at 23.59 BST.

One (1) code is awarded, while stock lasts, per qualifying HyperX order during the promotion period. Each code is valid for one-time use.

Code redemption is valid from June 15, 2023 through March 27, 2024.

The in-game items do not have a retail value and cannot be exchanged for cash.
